OOC: SOrry, I'd forgotten it.

Charon/DeepFear/SharpClaws/Underground: 

"Now bull, walk!!!" said Charon while his three brothers had their 
weapons ready "You'll follow us to answer some questions, every 
trouble that you give us and you will regret it, is it clear?"

"Don't do it worse, bully-guy" said Underground "You seem be a 
wonderful warrior, and still  safe you skin, just behave and follow 
us..."

"SHUT UP, UNDERGROUND, and you bull WALK!!!!" Shouted Charon. The 
group of moles started to lead Bullet towards perceptor's office.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> I know you kept the CR level down, thats why I posted that there 
was a
> sedative in the CR. He'd woken up but I was going to keep him 
inside until
> someone came to get him.
> 
> The door to the CR slid open, Bullet stepped out staggering and 
half asleep.
> His major injuries were healed and eventually his internal repairs 
would
> handle the rest. For now though his coordination and balance were 
impaired.
> He transformed to beast mode hopeing that four legs would be more 
stable
> than two.
> 
> Soon as he transformed four bots entered the room telling him to 
stop. In
> his current condition it wouldn't be a difficult task to obey. 
Besides, four
> on one was hardly fair odds, he knew that whatever he did wasn't 
good.
> 
>
